Description: Offered for sale this week is a used pair of RayBan Large Aviator Sunglasses. RB3025 L2823 58[]14 135 3N, made in Italy. RayBan makes 3 sizes of the aviator 55, 58, 62, please verify your size before purchase. Right lens has a small vertical scratch below my line of sight. Frames will need a slight adjustment they are out of square, see the last picture. Hinges are tight and arms are free of any bite marks. Nice pair of quality made sunglasses. Glasses will come in a black Rayban Case. The auction is for what is pictured nothing more or less. Please verify size prior to purchase. Check our other listing for more interesting items. Thank You Frames measure from temple to temple 5 1/2".Lenses measure 2 3/8" x 2".Arms measure from joint to tip 5" Shipping: Will be by US Postal Service or Fed Ex. No local pickup is offered. We will Not ship using your account number. Items selling for $100.00+ will require a signature upon delivery. No International Shipping. We ship Monday - Friday, usually within 24 hours of cleared payment. Please note: We only accept PayPal, no other form of payment is accepted. Payment must be received within 3 days of close of auction. We will only ship to a Confirmed PayPal address. If your address is not confirmed this will delay shipping. About Us: You can bid with confidence, knowing that you will be treated in a fast and professional manner. We always give a detailed description of the item, along with actual photos of the item. You will never see stock photos in our listings. We believe you should be able to see the actual item in real-time condition. We have been selling on eBay since 2007 and your satisfaction is our main concern. Thank You and have a blessed day. Track Page Views With Auctiva's FREE Counter
